evidence.text: NOTICE of Hearing: Bench Trial set for 2/28/2022 - 3/4/2022 and 3/7/2022 - 3/8/2022 09:30 AM in Columbia #1, Matthew J. Perry Court House, 901 Richland St, Columbia before Honorable J Michelle Childs.

TEXT ORDER: Due to courtroom availability in the Matthew J. Perry Federal Courthouse in Columbia, the Panel, pursuant to Local Rule 3.01(c) (D.S.C.), hereby transfers the case to the Charleston Division of the United States District Court for the District of South Carolina for purposes of the trial. The trial will commence on February 28, 2022 at 10:00 a.m.
